com.hotdocs.cloud

Interface InputStreamGetter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileInputStreamGetter, StringInputStreamGetter

    public interface InputStreamGetter
    A delegate for obtaining an input stream and its length.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLength() 
      java.io.InputStream getStream() 

    • Method Detail

      • getLength

        int getLength()
        Returns:
        The length of the stream, or -1 if the length is unknown.

                              throws java.io.IOException

        Throws:
